attributes.action: Machine or recorded voice sales calls should be banned
attributes.additional_details:
Machine sales calls should be banned. It's Saturday midday and I've already had five and I suspect this is the same for everyone.

There is no way to stop them repeat calling as it is a machine and there is no way to block them from your phone as they call from withheld numbers with no caller id.

They also call mobile hone regularly again with no method of stopping them.

It is quite simply a nuisance and now to the point of harassment from some and currently there is no redress for members of the public.
